MY EXPERIENCE

Autonmis Product Manager (Aug 2024 ‚Äî Nov 2024) LEAPS by Analyttica Associate Product Manager (June 2023 ‚Äî June 2024) Zolve Product Growth Associate (Dec 2021 ‚Äî Sept 2022)

Key Industries: Financial Services, SaaS, Data Infrastructure & Analytics

About me

I hold a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Information Technology from NMIMS University, where I first discovered my passion for India's thriving startup ecosystem through Startup India. This sparked my enthusiasm to work with early and mid-stage startups and shaped my aspiration to contribute to impactful products.

My professional journey began in Product Growth Development, where I cultivated skills in user experience, design, tech, and analytics. This naturally led me to discover my calling in Product Management.

I've since worked as an Associate Product Manager at a B2B SaaS startup and as a founding Product Manager at a stealth startup, solving unique challenges and driving meaningful impact. My mission as a Product Manager is simple yet powerful: to help people work smarter, not harder, by building thoughtful, innovative solutions.

Outside of work, I love reading (fantasy fiction and self-help), staying active with yoga and gym workouts, traveling, and experimenting in the kitchen.

Curious to know more about my journey and experiences?

My Work

Autonmis

At Autonmis, I was a Product Manager helping data professionals streamline workflows, automate processes, and unlock insights through a low-code data platform.

LEAPS by Analyttica

At LEAPS by Analyttica, I was an Associate Product Manager, helping data professionals enhance data literacy and streamline their analytical workflows through a low-code/no-code platform.

View Projects

Zolve

At Zolve, I was a Product Growth Associate, optimizing user journeys, improving conversion rates, and driving lead generation through data-driven strategies and cross-functional collaboration.
